alert.note: Alert for Camden; Charlton; Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 1:47PM EST until January 04 at 2:15PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Camden County in southeastern Georgia... South central Glynn County in southeastern Georgia... Northeastern Charlton County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 215 PM EST. * At 147 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Homeland, or 10 miles northeast of Folkston, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Woodbine, Kings Bay Base, Jekyll Island, High Point, Tarboro, Harrietts Bluff, Dover Bluff and Dungeness. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.
